item.title: Organización
item.description: Muchos de los artículos más curiosos comienzan en un hilo en Twitter. Ése es el caso de éste. En un hilo con @recena, éste dijo:: I am really tired of the trends around job titles etc…. We should talk about software engineer and responsibilities, that’s all. Y eso es lo que ha inspirado este artículo. En realidad, no pude evitar responderle:: Fully agree. It is just a matter of responsabilities, joined by role, and assigning a bunch of roles to every people, ensuring each role is owned by at least 2 people and everyone is doing it right (with KPIs).
